alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 5:42PM EST until January 05 at 9:08AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... South Fork Kentucky River at Booneville affecting Owsley County. Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Red Lick Road, Millers Creek Road, Dark Hollow Road, and Noland Creek Road flood in several places. At 21.5 feet, Sang Branch Road is under water at Red Lick Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 PM EST Saturday the stage was 20.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 28.5 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 5 AM.
